page.title: 01Just Another Day
page.content: I would get up to the smell of coffee because my Dad makes it every day.I would have coffee and read the papers in my parents bedroom while we discuss what we would do.Sometimes we would go on picnics and on other days we would ride our bikes,that is my brother and I ,or sunbathe or play tennis or cricket in Jubilee Field.In the afternoon we may go swimming.When the weather is nice we would have barbecues and eat in the garden or if it is wet we might barbecue in the carport and eat in the house then we would play hot games inside like:Cribbage,Slam,Whist, Newmarket,Pontoon.Sometimes we play Monopoly and Chartbusters.But the favourite is"Trivial Pursuit"when we play this game we are amazed to see how much each one of us knows.When it is late i get kicked off to bed.I quite like these days as everybody has fun.
